name: The Community
description:
[Game jam project held by Brackeys]

Have ever wondered to be in a small community where you have to impress each other, if not then try it out. You have to be supporting each other in this community. you always have the backpack with you so that you will never run out of items for your fellow community. You support them with what you have and they support you back with awards which will help you do some exchanges at the market so that your backpack won`t run out of items.

use wsad or arrow keys to move
